transcript: and what would you say your circle of close friends is right now what's the number three how many of those three close friends go way back more than 10 years that's what I thought do you think that that is healthy would you like it to be more is it just perfect I don't ascribe a label to it I enjoy the life that I have if I had no friends and I enjoy the life that I have I would be fine with that and if I had 20 friends I would enjoy the life that I had
